after i install kerbal konstrut and ksc ++ game crashes at initializing

link to log files:https://www.dropbox.com/sh/ngs8496vooapbtv/AAAbujWDyE4SC21x1X5e0u43a?dl=0

please tell me what did it go so wrong 

Edited July 3, 2018 by tonimark
The latest release of KSC++ (v4.1) is released for KSP 1.2.x - 1.3.x, so probably it is just incompatiple with KSP 1.4.4.

k removing it and re try

 

NOPE AND EVEN I REMOVE IT GAME STILL CRASHES AT LOADING HELP!!!!!!!!!
i think i found the problem its maybe umbra space industried (after removing kerbal konstruct game still crashed this was the last file removed befor it works porperty)
AND THE WE GO AL THAT UMBRA INDUSTRIED FOLDER IN GAMETADA CAUSED THAT CRASH ISSUE CLOSED
If you want to heavily mod the game, I recommend rolling it back to version 1.4.3 until the mods can be updated to work properly with the update that was just released like a week ago....
